name: Invoice Processing Automation
brief_description: Automated invoice processing system for accounts payable workflow. Processes vendor invoices from PDF format to ERP system entry.
process_details:
1. Extract invoice data using OCR
2. Validate against vendor master
3. Route for approval workflow
4. Update ERP system
object_details:
Invoice PDFs from shared mailbox
Vendor master data from SAP
Approval workflow in ServiceNow
comments: Initial deployment successful. Minor issues with OCR accuracy for handwritten invoices.
demo:
Production issues resolved:
- OCR accuracy improved
- Error handling enhanced

name: Employee Onboarding Automation
brief_description: Automated employee onboarding process that creates accounts across multiple systems and sends welcome packages.
process_details:
1. Receive new hire data from HRIS
2. Create AD account
3. Provision Office 365 license
4. Create ServiceNow tickets
5. Send welcome email
object_details:
New hire data from Workday
Active Directory provisioning
Office 365 licensing
ServiceNow ticket creation
comments: Currently in UAT phase. Good performance metrics observed.
demo:
UAT findings:
- Response time optimization needed
- Exception handling improved

name: Financial Reporting Automation
brief_description: Automated generation of monthly financial reports from multiple data sources with email distribution.
process_details:
1. Extract data from SAP
2. Combine with Excel templates
3. Generate PDF reports
4. Email to stakeholders
object_details:
SAP financial data
Excel report templates
Email distribution lists
comments: Simple automation with high reliability. No major issues reported.
demo:
No major issues identified
Routine maintenance scheduled

name: Customer Data Sync Automation
brief_description: Real-time synchronization of customer data between CRM and ERP systems with conflict resolution.
process_details:
1. Monitor CRM for data changes
2. Transform data format
3. Validate business rules
4. Update ERP system
5. Handle conflicts
object_details:
Salesforce CRM API
SAP ERP integration
Data validation rules
Conflict resolution logic
comments: Complex integration requiring careful testing. Performance optimization in progress.
demo:
Pre-production testing:
- Load testing completed
- Security review pending

name: Inventory Management Automation
brief_description: Automated inventory level monitoring and purchase order generation based on predefined thresholds.
process_details:
1. Check inventory levels daily
2. Compare against min/max thresholds
3. Generate purchase orders
4. Route for approval
5. Send to suppliers
object_details:
ERP inventory data
Supplier master data
Approval workflow system
Purchase order templates
comments: Stable automation reducing manual effort by 80%. Excellent ROI achieved.
demo:
Successful deployment:
- 80% reduction in manual work
- Zero stock-outs since implementation

name: Compliance Reporting Automation
brief_description: Automated generation of regulatory compliance reports for multiple jurisdictions with data validation.
process_details:
1. Extract data from multiple sources
2. Apply regulatory rules
3. Validate data quality
4. Generate compliance reports
5. Submit to authorities
object_details:
Financial transaction data
Regulatory rule engines
Data quality checks
Reporting templates
comments: Critical automation ensuring regulatory compliance. Zero compliance violations since deployment.
demo:
Regulatory audit passed:
- 100% accuracy achieved
- Submission deadlines met
